overview: James Gee is an expert expedition tour guide for Discovery Expeditions & Adventures. He has traveled to destinations such as Africa, Egypt, Peru, Petra, Israel and more. On each of these trips he guides smaller groups (between 20-30 people) to exotic destinations to see the wonders the world has to offer.
